android.preference
类 RingtonePreference

java.lang.Object
  android.preference.Preference
      android.preference.RingtonePreference
所有已实现的接口：
PreferenceManager.OnActivityResultListener, Comparable<Preference>
public class RingtonePreference
extends Preference
implements PreferenceManager.OnActivityResultListener

A Preference that allows the user to choose a ringtone from those on the device. The chosen ringtone's URI will be persisted as a string.

If the user chooses the "Default" item, the saved string will be one of Settings.System.DEFAULT_RINGTONE_URI or Settings.System.DEFAULT_NOTIFICATION_URI. If the user chooses the "Silent" item, the saved string will be an empty string.

public void setRingtoneType(int type)

另请参见：
RingtoneManager.EXTRA_RINGTONE_TYPE

getShowDefault

public boolean getShowDefault()
Returns whether to a show an item for the default sound/ringtone.

返回：
Whether to show an item for the default sound/ringtone.

setShowDefault

public void setShowDefault(boolean showDefault)
Sets whether to show an item for the default sound/ringtone. The default to use will be deduced from the sound type(s) being shown.

参数：
showDefault - Whether to show the default or not.
另请参见：
RingtoneManager.EXTRA_RINGTONE_SHOW_DEFAULT

参数：
showSilent - Whether to show 'Silent'.
另请参见：

onActivityResult

public boolean onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                Intent data)
从接口 PreferenceManager.OnActivityResultListener 复制的描述
See Activity's onActivityResult.

指定者：
接口 PreferenceManager.OnActivityResultListener 中的 onActivityResult
返回：
Whether the request code was handled (in which case subsequent listeners will not be called.
